div.div:
kind: Certificate
metadata:
name: cert-1
spec:
dnsNames:
- example.com
issuerRef: issuer-1
secretName: cert-1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 73px; height: 1px; padding-top: 242px; margin-left: 404px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
apiVersion: gateway.networking.k8s.io/v1alpha2kind: Gateway
metadata:
name: gateway-1
annotations:
cert-manager.io/issuer: issuer-1
spec:
listeners:
- hostname: example.com
tls:
mode: Terminate
certificateRefs:
- kind: Secret
name: cert-1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 104px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: user creates a Gateway "gateway-1" with cert-manager annotations

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 242px; height: 1px; padding-top: 654px; margin-left: 290px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
kind: Secret
metadata:
name: cert-1
stringData:
tls.crt: |
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
(leaf)
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
(intermediate)
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
tls.key: |
-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
AaBbCcDd0
-----END PRIVATE KEY-----

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 227px; height: 1px; padding-top: 654px; margin-left: 10px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
kind: Certificate
spec:
issuerRef: issuer-1
secretName: cert-1
status:
revision: 1
conditions:
- type: Ready
status: "True"
reason: Issued
- type: Issuing
status: "False"
reason: Issued

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 557px; margin-left: 7px;
